base_description: Gray two-drawer cabinet, rectangular and compact.
part_description: Two drawers stacked vertically with horizontal handles, occupying the front face. The cabinet is rectangular with a flat top and smooth sides.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out on internal tracks, allowing access to the storage space within. The handles provide grip for opening and closing. The structure supports the drawers, maintaining alignment and stability.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk. Users interact by pulling the handles to open the drawers for storing or retrieving items. It may be moved or adjusted to fit different spaces.
